contextId.information: Yahweh speaks of himself as if he were another person so that Jeremiah and the people of Judah will listen carefully to what he says. Translate as in [[:en:bible:notes:jer:01:07|01:8]]. AT: "this is what Yahweh has declared" or "this is what Yahweh has said" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_pronouns]])

These commands and instances of "yourself" and "your" and "you" are addressed to "virgin Israel" and so are singular. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_pronouns]])
contextId.quote: Place road signs for yourself ... Set up guideposts for yourself ... Set your mind ... you should take ... Come back
